contact.faq1Question: How do I enroll in a course?
contact.faq1Answer: Visit our Courses page, select your desired course, and click Enroll. You can complete the registration and payment online. Our team will confirm your enrollment within 24 hours.
contact.faq2Question: What payment methods do you accept?
contact.faq2Answer: We accept bank cards (Visa, Mastercard), bank transfers, and cash payments at our office. Installment plans are available for selected courses.
contact.faq3Answer: Yes. You may request a full refund within 7 days of enrollment if you have not started the course. Partial refunds may apply in other cases—please contact us for details.
contact.faq4Answer: Many of our courses offer both in-person and online options. Check the course details for availability. We use modern platforms for live and recorded sessions.
contact.faq5Answer: Yes. Upon successful completion of a course, you receive an official AmareStudy certificate that is recognized by employers and institutions.
